message: Really it takes more faith to believe in the nonsense of evolution crap than to have faith in God. Woooo such big words with your mindless conclusions. And regarding """"the invisible space daddy"""" part of your brainless rant-we shall see how brave you really are someday when your miserable carcass stands in front of the God you so proudly and bravely mock and disbelieve in. Yes, we will see how well it works out for you. Really going to suck to be you some day but that's your choice. And no I could care less what you think nor will I come back to read any more of your uninspiring comments. Evolution is as illogical as much as it is impossible.
Spoken by nearly everyone in this country. They dropped the ball. Clinton and Obama.
